- (id) initWithURL: (NSURL *)  apiURL
secureURL: (NSURL *)  secureURL
apiKey: (NSString *)  apiKey 

Initialize a new instance with the provided API URL and key.

Parameters:
apiURLThe base non-encrypted API URL. Used for all non-authenticated methods.
secureURLThe secure API URL. This will be used for authenticated methods.
apiKeyA Wordnik-supplied API key.
